label: 黄楊木
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: A yellow and extremely tight-grained woods used decoratively in high quality woodwork. In the Shōsō-in, it is used in boxes, as an inlay in marquetry, for the pegboxs or headpieses on biwa, and in other fine craftsmanship. [琵琶]
